title.value: Effect of herbicides and soil surface profile on sowings infestation and qualitative parameters of white cabbage seedlings
Влияние гербицидов и профиля поверхности почвы на засоренность посевов и качественные показатели рассады капусты белокачанной

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Aksenyuk, A.R., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented results of studies assessing the effect of herbicides on the weeds of crops and qualitative indicators of white cabbage (Brassica oleracea convar. capitata var. alba L.) seedlings grown on flat and contoured surfaces of the soil in the open field. Summarizing the data on the efficacy of herbicides for cabbage crops of grown in an open nursery using various ways of their application and soil surface it was found that the biological efficiency of Butizan 400, suspension concentrates (2.0 l / ha), Butizan Star, suspension concentrates (1.5; 1.7; and 2.0 liter / ha), Stomp, 33%, emulsion concentrate (3.0; 4.0; 5.0; and 6.0 liter / ha) and Teridox, emulsion concentrate (2.0, 2.5 and 3.0 l / ha) reached 61,6-98,2% by quantity and 50,5-98,6% - by wet weight of aboveground weed. Selective ability of the analysed herbicides depended on agro-meteorological conditions during seedling production, consumption rates and method of application on flat and profiled surface of the soil. Herbicides Stomp and Teridox with increasing application rates rendered some inhibitory effect not only on the weeds, but also on the seedlings of cabbage. Thus, the height of the plants compared to the control (without herbicides ) decreased by 8.9-28.0%, there was a steady decrease in stem diameter , number of leaves , their linear dimensions , and the consequent reduction of the assimilation leaf area and wet weight seedlings.
